CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Location__c), '', IF(ISBLANK(Location__r.Address_1__c), '', Location__r.Address_1__c & BR()) & IF(ISBLANK(Location__r.Address_2__c), '', Location__r.Address_2__c & BR()) & IF(ISBLANK(Location__r.City__c) && ISBLANK(Location__r.State__c) && ISBLANK(Location__r.Zip__c), '', IF(ISBLANK(Location__r.City__c), '', Location__r.City__c & ', ') & IF(ISBLANK(Location__r.State__c), '', Location__r.State__c & ', ') & IF(ISBLANK(Location__r.Zip__c), '', Location__r.Zip__c) & BR() ) )
CustomField.label: Return Address
